Blog.post: after posting lyk 10 of our classmates... i decided to stop cuz tis sucs... anyway i figured out tat most of u guys would hate it so i stop and deleted all tat was posted... if u would lyk ur picture and blablabla to be on tis page juz tell me and send me a better photo and wad words u wanna to be up...
urlLink de first slide frm de ppt. ... i erased all de words so its veri ugly now.... well there some photos here tat remind me of our classroom... it was so ugly... lol urlLink

well... all things have been done... and did i tell u it will be soon... so soon tat it was in less than a hr... lol... anyway de counter is gone... who cares... bet u didnt noe it was even there... time to put all ur photos up... lol... all taken frm de powerpoint slide mrs tan gave us.... so if u wanna better photos send it over... i will leave out de malays 4 de time bein... and sum other pep i bet most of u guys will hate...

hi guys... i was doin my main blog when i suddenly though of doin tis cuz i miss de old clazz so much... hate me current clazz... well almost everything is the same as my main blog... i juz kinda of copied de template... even de tag board and de counter are shared anyway de counter doesnt really work i think... i will repair it when i gotta time... i will repair tis page sum time soon... and i have forgotten some of de classmates.... so dun cry... juz tell me kk... (especially de malays...) ... i only have reference 4 de chinese.... i juz kinda of forget after TWO years.... so plz forgive me... there r no indians rite?!?!?!?
first time doin tis... hi everyone(if there is) juz rite anything and anything here... if u can.... well anyway... helo.... tis is so last minute... but who care...
ah!!!... tankz to tis guy ...Anonymous... i gotta it all goin... alot of improvement to de site... including a link coner so now i can put tis as my homepage...

finally... i finish with alot of effort... i finally created de headings and de part for de "contact" but de words are jumbled... could sumone tell me how to put the "no." in another line? cuz its veri confusing now...

well its me again... well i noe de site sucks... cuz im a loser in html... i totally suc in it... i onli noe how to do simple editing and maybe adding text... the tag board was there if about 1 hr of trial and error... now im trying to put up a colum for "contacting me" and a heading for de tag board...( de "words from de great one" was kinda of a accident... it was surpose to be de discription 4 de post...lol) well if anyone has any comments 4 tis page plz add as a commet...(plz tell me how to do it to)

haha... i very long nv add any post... now im back and free of stress.... de last few weeks was horrible.... school repoened and test started rolling my mind in a week!!!! so crappy.... welll now its all over and its a friday.... managed to grab hold of de com and added tis post... well nobody every reads it anyway... well its a diary and how can pep read ur diary.... lol
